message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique qualities and craftsmanship. Given its worth to you stands at $1,000,000, I believe we can find common ground. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $1,100,000. I am confident this price strikes a balance between our interests and presents an attractive proposition for both parties. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of conducting this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
